item.text: Now some men came down from Judea and began to teach the brothers, “Unless you are circumcised according to the custom of Moses, you cannot be saved.”

When <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="3756 3641">major</st> <st data-num="4714">argument</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2214" class="">debate</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, the church<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5021" class="">appointed</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="305">go up</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> meet with<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> point of <st data-num="2213" class="">disagreement</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> they were <st data-num="4311">sent on their way</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>, and as they <st data-num="1330">passed through</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="5403" class="">Phoenicia</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4540" class="">Samaria</st>, they were <st data-num="1555">relating at length</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1995" class="">conversion</st> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st>.

When they <st data-num="3854" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st>, they were <st data-num="3858" class="">received</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="312" class="">reported</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3745" class="">all the things</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="3" />
But some from the religious party of the Pharisees who had believed stood up and said, “It is necessary to circumcise the Gentiles and to order them to observe the law of Moses.”
Both the apostles and the elders met together to deliberate about this matter.

After there had <st data-num="1096" class="">been</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="2214" class="">debate</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="450">stood up</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="80">Brothers</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1987" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="575" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st> <st data-num="744" class="">ago</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1586" class="">chose</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="1223 4750">preach</st> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st> so they would <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="4" /> of the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="2589">knows the heart</st>,<n id="1" /> has <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> by <st data-num="1325" class="">giving</st> them the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he did to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="1252" class="">made</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1252" class="">distinction</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3342" class="">between</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="2511" class="">cleansing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st> by <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">why</st> are you <st data-num="3985" class="">putting</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to the <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="2007" class="">placing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="5137" class="">neck</st> of the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> a <st data-num="2218" class="">yoke</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have been <st data-num="2480" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="941" class="">bear</st>?
On the contrary, we believe that we are saved through the grace of the Lord Jesus, in the same way as they are.”
The whole group kept quiet and listened to Barnabas and Paul while they explained all the miraculous signs and wonders God had done among the Gentiles through them.

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="4601">stopped speaking</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st> <st data-num="611">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="80">Brothers</st>, <st data-num="191" class="">listen</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="4826" class="">Simeon</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="1834" class="">explained</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2531" class="">how</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="1980">concerned</st> himself<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2983" class="">select</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1537">from among</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st><n id="5" /> a <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.
The words of the prophets agree with this, as it is written,

‘After this I will return,

and I will rebuild the fallen tent of David;

I will rebuild its ruins and restore it,

so that the rest of humanity may seek the Lord,

namely, all the Gentiles I have called to be my own,’ says the Lord, who makes these things
known from long ago.
“Therefore I conclude that we should not cause extra difficulty for those among the Gentiles who are turning to God,

<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> that we should <st data-num="1989" class="">write</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1989" class="">a letter</st><n id="1" /> telling them to <st data-num="567" class="">abstain</st><n id="2" /> from things <st data-num="234" class="">defiled</st><n id="3" /> by <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> from <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> from what has been <st data-num="4156" class="">strangled</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> from <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>.
For Moses has had those who proclaim him in every town from ancient times, because he is read aloud in the synagogues every Sabbath.”
Then the apostles and elders, with the whole church, decided to send men chosen from among them, Judas called Barsabbas and Silas, leaders among the brothers, to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas.

They sent this letter with them:

From the apostles and elders, your brothers, to the Gentile brothers and sisters in Antioch, Syria, and Cilicia, greetings!

<st data-num="1894" class="">Since</st> we have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> have <st data-num="1831">gone out</st> <st data-num="1537">from among</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> with <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1291" class="">orders</st> from us and have <st data-num="5015" class="">confused</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="384" class="">upsetting</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">minds</st><n id="3" /> by <st data-num="3056">what they said</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3661" class="">unanimously</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1380" class="">decided</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="1586" class="">choose</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> to <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4862">along with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="27">dear friends</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>,

who<n id="1" /> have <st data-num="3860" class="">risked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">lives</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> we are <st data-num="649" class="">sending</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4609" class="">Silas</st><n id="2" /> who will <st data-num="518" class="">tell</st> you <st data-num="846" class="">these things</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">person</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it <st data-num="1380">seemed best</st> to the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2007" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3367">any</st> <st data-num="4183">greater</st> <st data-num="922" class="">burden</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4133" class="">than</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1876">necessary rules</st>:<n id="2" />

that you abstain from meat that has been sacrificed to idols and from blood and from what has been strangled and from sexual immorality. If you keep yourselves from doing these things, you will do well. Farewell.
So when they were dismissed, they went down to Antioch, and after gathering the entire group together, they delivered the letter.

When they <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> it aloud,<n id="1" /> the people<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoiced</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> its <st data-num="3874" class="">encouragement</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5037" class="">Both</st> <st data-num="2455" class="">Judas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4609" class="">Silas</st>, who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st>, <st data-num="3870" class="">encouraged</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1991" class="">strengthened</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">long</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">speech</st>.<n id="1" />

After<n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="4160" class="">spent</st> some <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> there,<n id="2" /> they were <st data-num="630">sent off</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> those who had <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="3" />
But Paul and Barnabas remained in Antioch, teaching and proclaiming (along with many others) the word of the Lord.
After some days Paul said to Barnabas, “Let’s return and visit the brothers in every town where we proclaimed the word of the Lord to see how they are doing.”

<st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="1014" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="4838" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="3138" class="">Mark</st> <st data-num="4838" class="">along with</st> them <st data-num="2532">too</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="515" class="">insisted</st><n id="1" /> that they should <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4838">take along</st> <st data-num="3778">this one</st> who had <st data-num="868" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3828" class="">Pamphylia</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> had <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4905" class="">accompanied</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>.

They <st data-num="1096" class="">had</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3948" class="">sharp disagreement</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="673" class="">parted company</st>. <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took along</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3138" class="">Mark</st> and <st data-num="1602">sailed away</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2954" class="">Cyprus</st>,<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1951" class="">chose</st> <st data-num="4609" class="">Silas</st> and <st data-num="1831">set out</st>, <st data-num="3860" class="">commended</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="2" />
He passed through Syria and Cilicia, strengthening the churches.
